QuestData.Title: Silver Lining
QuestData.Description: Once the Scourge have a target in their sights, they'll stop at nothing to acquire it.$b$bYou're doomed to a mindless existence as a walking corpse....$b$b<Stefan's face twists into a cruel grin.>$b$b... unless we can use their desires against them.$b$bI'll explain later. I have complex magic to prepare which requires certain material components.$b$bTravel due east of here to the land beneath the Reliquary of Agony. Slay the ghouls and abominations you'll find there and return to me with their remnants.
QuestData.LogDescription: Stefan in Ebon Watch asked you to go to the Reliquary of Agony to collect 5 Putrid Abomination Guts from the Putrid Abominations and 5 Gooey Ghoul Drools.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you brought the components I asked for, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: <Stefan sifts through the foul components.>$b$bWell, it's far from perfect, but it'll have to do.$b$bNow brace yourself, $c. This is where it gets good....
